\# TorontoJS \[ ONLINE \] TechTalk - Security in software releases: Aristide Bouix & Srgjan Dimitrijevikj

ðŸ™Œ **TorontoJS Tech Talks \[ Online \] is back again!**  
We're thrilled to announce the return of TorontoJS Tech Talks to the virtual stage! In this session, we're diving into the topic of security in software releases!

ðŸ‘‹ **Meet Our Special Guest,**  
[Aristide Bouix](https://www.linkedin.com/in/aristide-bouix/) Head Of Product Security and [Srgjan Dimitrijevikj](https://www.linkedin.com/in/srgjan-dimitrijevikj-2a196130/) principle software engineering security and growth [@Catawiki.](https://x.com/catawiki)

**Schedule:**  
**3:00 pm**\- Warm welcome and introduction by TorontoJS  
**3:10 pm** - Presentation by our esteemed speakers.  
**4:00 pm** - Interactive Q&A Session  
**4:15 pm** - Neworking  
**4:30 PM** - Closing Remarks

This event will unfold on Zoom, bringing together minds from everywhere in an inspiring virtual space.

Interested in speaking or sponsoring? Let's connect at sponsor\[[@torontojs.com](http://@torontojs.com)\]([mailto:organizers@torontojs.com](http://mailto:organizers@torontojs.com)).

TorontoJS is committed to creating a safe and inclusive environment for all. Our Code of Conduct applies both online and in person at all our events and spaces.

For more information on events @ TorontoJS please check out:

See you there!
